verses.plain: The LORD reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.

tokens.t: reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth
the cherubims; let the earth be moved.

verses.plain: The LORD is great in Zion; and he is high above all the people.
Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.

tokens.t: Let them praise thy great and terrible name;

verses.plain: The king’s strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.

tokens.t: The king’s strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.

verses.plain: Exalt ye the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.

tokens.t: our God, and worship at his footstool;

verses.plain: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.

tokens.t: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the

verses.plain: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.

tokens.t: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance

verses.plain: Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.

tokens.t: our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.

verses.plain: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.

tokens.t: our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the

footnotes.text: he is…: or, it is holy
